name: OROGOLD Cosmetics
overview:
Launched in 2008 in the United States and shortly thereafter across the world, OROGOLD Cosmetics is a successful global skincare and beauty brand that has made its mark on the world as so much more than a passing trend. After the phenomenal success of the company in the US, outlets were opened in the United Kingdom, South Africa Dubai and many more.

OROGOLD Cosmetics in an Experience Every one of the OROGOLD Cosmetics stores has been developed to be an experience and a pampering, delightful time. With trained beauty therapists and knowledgeable staff, every person who enters their store is given personal attention, advice and products that match their specific beauty needs. It is one of the founding statements of the company; that each client should have the opportunity to experience the products and see the results before they make a purchase. This unique business model and the products themselves are the foundation for the continued success of OROGOLD Cosmetics.

The development team and research scientists at OROGOLD Cosmetics understand that there is not one product that will miraculously improve skin quality. For this reason, all products have been developed as a series of products that can be used in combination to get the very best results and effects that will last a lifetime. Each series has a specific purpose, but it is the addition of 24K gold to the products that ensures that you will see stunning results, almost immediately.

24K Gold in each OROGOLD Product Scientists have documented the health benefits and beauty benefits of pure gold for hundreds of years. The healing power of pure gold has been documented as far back as ancient Egypt and China where wealthy women used gold as a purifier and to combat the signs of aging. OROGOLD Cosmetics uses 24K pure gold nano particles in their products. The particles are small enough to move through the skin barrier where they are quickly absorbed to work on skin cells. The power of the pure colloidal gold used in all products is noticed immediately and clients experience a visible reduction in fine lines as well as overall health of their skin. Gold works at a cellular level and aids in the process of cell regeneration, which does tend to slow down as one ages. By boosting cell regeneration, the skin is visibly smoother almost immediately.

OROGOLD Cosmetics presents a series of skincare products that include vitamins, cryogenic, bionic as well as serums and boosters to ensure that every facet of beauty and skincare is covered for each client. OROGOLD Cosmetics is about much more than just excellent products: Each client entering the high-end boutiques is given expert personal attention and advice about skin care and beauty. With stores and retailers carrying the line in Israel, Hong Kong, Spain and the Philippines, OROGOLD is set on expanding into diverse markets in the next two years to allow more women to experience the power of Pure Old and the company experience.
